sect1.title: Ubuntu Installation
sect1.para:
You need to download and install the Firewall Builder package:
Example: fwbuilder_4.2.2.3541-ubuntu-karmic-1_i386.deb
To satisfy dependencies, you need the following packages installed on your system:

listitem.para: QT 4.3.x, 4.4.x, 4.5.x, 4.6.x. Firewall Builder uses features available in QT 4.3 and later; the system does not support version 4.2 and earlier.

sect1.para: You can obtain QT using your favorite package manager.
